product Name: SAMSUNG Galaxy A04e (SM-A042M/DS) Dual SIM 32GB, 6.5" GSM Unlocked, International Version (32GB SD Card Bundle) - Light Blue
about: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon, Sprint and Cricket.
NOTE : 4G Network availability may vary depending on the country, network provider, and user environment.
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items.
Product Description: Samsung Galaxy A04e features a 6.5 inches PLS LCD display that has a 720 x 1600 pixels resolution. The device supports Dual SIM and it is built with a glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame.
